inclusion.criterion: Diagnosis of Crohn's disease made at least 3 months prior to study entry.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: C-reactive protein above the upper limit of normal.
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Currently have moderately active Crohn's disease.
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Women who are pregnant or lactating or of childbearing potential.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of colostomy, ileostomy, intestinal resection resulting in short bowel syndrome or symptomatic strictures.
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Symptoms (abdominal pain, vomiting) and radiographic evidence of mechanical bowel obstruction within the previous 6 months.
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Positive stool culture for enteric pathogens and/or C. difficile toxin.
exclusion.label: triggers

notes: Patient has symptoms and radiographic evidence of mechanical bowel obstruction within the previous 6 months, which is a likely exclusion criterion.
